item.title: Forget Jennifer Lawrence & Tom Cruise, The Real Stars Of Cannes 2025 Are First Time Directors
item.description: The Cannes Film Festival is often attended by some of the world's biggest stars & this year is no different with its slate of highly-anticipated films

item.title: Sadie Sink Suits Up As The Superhero Daughter Of Tobey Maguire's Peter Parker In Stunning Spider-Man: Brand New Day Art
item.description: Stranger Things' Sadie Sink joins the MCU as the superhero daughter of Tobey Maguire's Peter Parker through gorgeous Spider-Man: Brand New Day art.

item.title: Gladiator II Confirmed A Denzel Washington Belief I've Held For Over 20 Years
item.description: Denzel Washington's role in Gladiator II highlights just how effective the Academy Award-winning star is in villainous roles.
